attributes.action: Sort out the problems in this country instead of giving aid to Africa , India etc...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of donating however many millions (or billions) to other countries how about we sort out our own country first by putting that money into our NHS and home grown charities benefiting people in the UK !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
